name: Robogirls Get Together
description:
You're a robot and a girl. Your girlfriend is a robot and also a girl, and you're both trans. And now you're trying to meet up already. Go do that!

This is my little project for Trans Gal Jam 3! Much smaller in scale compared to last year's entry, but I'm satisfied with how it turned out. 

Made with Bitsy, with love. <3
